shaka rashiyak da saththawa wishesha wishala pumanayak da mema parisara paddhathiyen hamuwi atha.emenma lankawe theth wananthara wala hamuwena uraga,shaka,ubhaya,mathsya, pakshi wishesha rashiyak mema wanantharayen wartha wi atha.wali goda damima,wewal unagas dummala wani da simawakin thorawa laba ganima,gas kapima,janawasa bihiwima mema parisara paddhathiyata tharjanayak bawata ada warthamanaye path wi atha..namuth sathutata karanawak lesa idam himikarawan wisin mema parisaraya aaraksha kirimata dakwana uthsahaya nisa ema tharjana bohoseyin adapana wima dakwan puluwan.mema jaiwa widyathmaka watina kamakin yuthu parisara paddhathiya raka ganima obeth mageth yuthukama ha wagakima nowanneda ?.........

namuth mema yanthranaye karyabharaya pulul kirime awashyathawayak mathuwa thibe.hanipuranaya sandaha wana karyalayak?pasugiya juni masa 28 wanida hanipurnaya sandaha wana karyalayak pihituwima sandaha panath ketumpatha gasat karanu labu athara eya me wana wita parlimenthuwata idiripath kara thibe.mema karyalaye pihita katada?ek wargika kotasakata, aagamika ho ek pradeshayakata sima nowi shri lankawe siwil yuddhaya, deshapalana nosansunbhawayan ho siwil kalambaim, barapathala ganaye ayithiwasikam kadawim saha balahathkarayen athurudahan karawim sambandhayen windithayan bawata path wu ho owunge gnyathinta mema karyalaye pihita labe.
